section.title: DEV 1 instance
section.para: In the development environment we have depicted a network drawing, , in which a development node, called dev1.core.dmsat1.org, is present.

In order to get the dev1 system operational, we need to conduct the following tasks:
Do bare metal deployment of the target node.
Adapt the puppet-dmsat1 RPM package with all the YAML files needed for the Linux base infrastructure services in the dmsat1 Deployment zone and make it available via the Spacewalk server in the example-puppet-structure-6u5-1_0 software channel.
Provision the dev1 node via Puppet.
